intro.title: Book Direct & Save
intro.description: Book your stay on our website and receive a complimentary meal deal, valued up to 29 euros per day.

careers.jobDescription: We're always looking for energetic people who love hospitality. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, get in touch!
